reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant teacher! Prof. Chen makes complex concepts easy to understand and provides great real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson knows her subject well, but her lectures can be a bit dry. More interactive sessions would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Rodriguez is a math genius! His problem-solving techniques have really improved my analytical skills.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's lab sessions are well-organized and informative. She ensures safety while making experiments interesting.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson seems knowledgeable, but his lectures are hard to follow. More structured content would be appreciated.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Kowalski's passion for physics is contagious! Her demonstrations make complex theories come to life.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's in-depth analysis of literary works is impressive. His essay feedback is particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia presents interesting topics, but sometimes struggles to manage class discussions effectively.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's real-world applications of economic theories make the subject relevant and interesting.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green's field trips and hands-on projects make learning about the environment both fun and impactful.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. O'Brien encourages critical thinking, but his assignments can be overly abstract and confusing.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Tanaka's cross-cultural perspectives are eye-opening. Her lectures are always thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez's passion for art is inspiring. Her virtual museum tours are an excellent learning experience.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Okafor presents balanced viewpoints on complex political issues. His debate sessions are particularly engaging.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Prof. Watson is knowledgeable, but her assignments can be unclear. More examples would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Ali's practical approach to engineering problems is excellent. His industry connections are invaluable for internships.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Rossi's ear training exercises have significantly improved my musical abilities. Her feedback is always constructive.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Smith seems disinterested in teaching. His lectures are monotonous and lack engagement with students.

reviews.subject: CompSci and Business
reviews.review: Prof Brian is a brilliant lecturer however he often give sudden quizzes to review his students. This works very well!
